channel.title: +1 Forward - Thrilling Adventures!
channel.description:
https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/1-forward/thrilling-adventures
Rach and Rich bring on Miciah Dodge to talk about his pulp adventure game *Thrilling Adventures!*
Timecodes: 0:02:24 - Read a Sitch about Playing in The Groove together 0:11:06 - Open Your Brain to *Thrilling Adventures!* 0:20:47 - Act Under Fire with Curtis and Plussy in the bayou seeking the Jade Bat
Check out Miciah's Kickstarter here: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/miciahdodge/thrilling-adventures-tabletop-role-playing-game
